## Installation

First install Node.JS v12+

```sh
$ npm install djs-chatbot
```

## Importing

```js
//JAVASCRIPT
const chat = require('djs-chatbot');

//TYPESCRIPT
import chat from 'djs-chatbot';
```

## Support

Join the support [discord server](https://saberofficial.ml/support.html)

## Examples

Chatbot Command
```js
const lmao = require("djs-chatbot");

module.exports = {
	name: "chatbot",
	run: async (client, message) => {
		const reply = await lmao.chat({ Message: "MESSAGE HERE" });
		return message.channel.send(reply);
	};
};
```

Always On Chatbot
```js
const lmao = require("djs-chatbot");

client.on("message", async message => {

	const reply = await lmao.chat({ Message: "MESSAGE HERE" });
	return message.channel.send(reply);
});
```
